Title: 12 Million Dollar Movie on Paper
Storyline: N/A

Title: A Cowboy Against Thunder
Storyline: Three traders make their way across the prairies to deliver a mysterious box to an unknown buyer, but an unnatural storm strands them at a homestead. The house is home to a single strange occupant - The Watcher. The Watcher tells tales of a magic lantern and a desperate cowboy attempting to save his wife. As they decide what's real and what's not, the traders hatch a plan to retrieve the large iron chest they left stranded in the storm. The Watcher warns them of a spirit that haunts his homestead to this very day. Unexplained happenings and violent confrontations lead to the revelation that The Watcher is not as he appears. A twisted family history leads to the truth behind the lantern. And just when it seems like the traders have a handle on things, they come face-to-face with the elusive cult known only as The Red Hats.

Title: Adiós al amigo
Storyline: Revolutionary soldier Alfredo Duarte Amado receives a telegram with the news of the pregnancy of his brother wife. He convinces an amateur photographer in the bowels of the Chicamocha canyon to go with him searching for his brother.

Title: Andromeda: 1883
Storyline: A space marine travels back in time to save the future of the human race.

Title: Astral Plane Drifter
Storyline: Sometime Before Yesterday. Or After Tomorrow. Somewhere Out In The Yonder. There Was This Guy.

Title: Attack on Tranquility
Storyline: N/A

Title: Bitter Gold
Storyline: Pacífico's injury thrusts his daughter Carola into leading his mining crew, navigating greed, misogyny, and threats while trying to secure their future.

Title: Bo Nan Za
Storyline: A string of solitary figures grope their way through the sun-drenched wilderness. Misguided by hopes and driven by shadows, they silently fall into a creeping dependency. Some of these spectral characters coexist in a "nowadays" world of different limits. Embarking on a day and night quest through the desolate streets, they end up caught in a bizarre procession of personal rituals. Meanwhile, a dignified urban drifter explores and remaps the common roads of the sleeping city. The highs and lows of urban life might ultimately be transcended. A change of roles is about to come.

Title: Bolero
Storyline: A woman travels through dimensions to find a distant man.

Title: Boot Hill
Storyline: N/A

Title: Buffalo Kids
Storyline: Two Irish orphans journey by train across America, encountering villains and heroes. They make an extraordinary friend and search for a new home, facing adventures and dangers along the way.

Title: Bullet or Rope
Storyline: N/A

Title: Buried on Shine Mountain
Storyline: Two young farmhands, led by an experienced prospector, venture up the dangerous and haunted Shine Mountain in search of life-changing fortune.

Title: Calamity Jane
Storyline: After her husband-to-be Wild Bill Hickok is killed in an infamous poker game, Calamity Jane must break out of prison and find his murderers before Deadwood's Sheriff can arrest her.

Title: Coyote Woman
Storyline: For the first time on screen: Real-life scalp hunters JJ Glanton and Judge Holden from the novel Blood Meridian. Cynthia is a captive turned Comanche Woman. She lives with the last free band until they cross ways with savage scalp hunters.

Title: Dans l'ombre de Marlow
Storyline: N/A

Title: Death After Dusk
Storyline: In the town of Buck Creek in 1899, the residents live in fear from a murderer known as the Buck Creek Killer. The sheriff decides to assemble a team of nine bounty hunters to track down and eliminate the ruthless killer once and for all.

Title: Desert Fiends
Storyline: Six friends on their way to a concert break down in the middle of nowhere and encounter a deranged family that lives in the desert killing anyone they come across.

Title: Doc Holliday 2
Storyline: The adventures of Doc Holliday continue as he finds himself on trial for the murder of a missing Faro player.

Title: Doc Holliday 3
Storyline: Doc Holliday retires to Colorado after a long battle with tuberculosis and finds himself in one final adventure to save a young man from ruthless outlaws.

Title: El Vaquero
Storyline: The arrival of a stray horse triggers a series of events in Bernicia's life that alters her world as she slowly takes on the persona of a cowboy.

Title: Escanyapobres
Storyline: The arrival of the train to an isolated town brings progress, but also to the obscure usurer Oleguer with shady businesses. When she expropriates the farmhouse of Cileta, the young peasant woman will do her best to recover her house.

Title: Eye for an Eye 2
Storyline: A blind swordsman reluctantly mentors an orphan seeking vengeance for his destroyed family, teaching him martial arts skills. The orphan waits for an opportunity to avenge his kin.

Title: Fyre Rises
Storyline: Debt-ridden pacifist Richard Fyre is propositioned to return to his abandoned mercenary ways by flamboyant zealot, Priest, to eliminate his international competition in exchange for a clean slate.

Title: Ghost Town
Storyline: Two families at odds for generations, are bent on revenge in the worst way.

Title: Ghosts of Red Ridge
Storyline: In the gold bust town of Red Ridge, a haunted Sheriff and his Deputy wrestle with outlaws causing chaos amid the town's decline.

Title: Goin' Home
Storyline: Apaches escape their reservation seeking revenge for the killing of a young Apache girl. Fort Bowie's commander sends B Troop, a bigoted, ill-tempered group of men he wants to rid himself from his command.

Title: Golden Kamuy
Storyline: In the early 20th century in Hokkaido, Japan, a treasure hunt between various parties takes place for a hidden stash of gold.

Title: Guns Blazin
Storyline: N/A

Title: Harsh Treatment
Storyline: When a pair of failed outlaws botch a big score, they settle for a smaller one instead - putting them in the crosshairs of a dangerous tracker who'll do anything to recover the priceless treasure they don't realize they've stolen.

Title: Hinter dem Eisernen Horizont
Storyline: The android E-Lena is about to embark on her biggest adventure yet. The search for her unknown creator takes her on a journey through time and into the Wild West. Not long after arriving, her bounty is hunted across the town.

Title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
Storyline: Chronicles a multi-faceted, 15-year span of pre-and post-Civil War expansion and settlement of the American west.

Title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 2
Storyline: The continuation of one story of the settlement of the American west. It follows the further adventures of characters first featured in Horizon: An American Saga.

Title: In Search of Bass Reeves
Storyline: Deputy U.S. Marshal Bass Reeves was one of the preeminent gunfighters of the Old West. We explore his life from captive slave to legendary lawman, through the antebellum South to the Civil War and the hostile plains of Indian Territory.

Title: Jama
Storyline: Kevin and Mia are con artists, who seduce and rob wealthy women. Their robbery of the wealthy seductress Emma goes awry. In a remote forest, Emma wakes up and flees. They set out to hunt her down. A game of cat and mouse begins.

Title: Joe Crist
Storyline: A former bounty hunter awakens from a six-week coma to find he has been 'touched' for a higher calling.

Title: Lady Outlaw
Storyline: In 1890s Oklahoma, a pair of fugitive lovers face a perilous journey home. With lawmen and bounty hunters hot on their heels, George and Rose must outwit their pursuers and navigate treacherous terrain to reach safety in Ingalls.

Title: Last Flamingo of the Red Summer Sunset
Storyline: The frontier is closing, but the imagination of the west remains. Decades since the genocide of a local tribe, there is one final 'wild-man'. Benjamin wishes to rid the land of the indigenous peoples, tasking Henry with extermination.

Title: Lolo & Sosaku: The Western Archive
Storyline: Filmmaker Sergio Caballero teams with contemporary sound artists Lolo and Sosaku. In this absurdist adventure with a Western flavor, the duo become modern cowboys, with the desert offering the raw materials to create complex sound machines and installations.

Title: Malaikottai Vaaliban
Storyline: Journey of Malaikottai Vaaliban, an undisputed warrior, transcends time and geographies, triumphing over every opponent he encounters.

Title: Morningstar
Storyline: A young woman must navigate the dangers of the Wild West to get to the man she is set to marry.

Title: Mr. Pettigrew
Storyline: N/A

Title: My Redneck Neighbor: Chapter 1 - The Rednecks Are Coming
Storyline: Crazy Asians collide with a bunch of Insane Rednecks who move into an Hollywood Hillside to set up

Title: Myall Creek Day of Justice
Storyline: Based on the story of late 1830's colonial Australia where an unspeakable crime against First Nations people caused an upheaval between law and order.

Title: Oltre il confine
Storyline: N/A

Title: Once Upon a Time in Amityville
Storyline: The origins of the Amityville legend are explored in an old settlement town.

Title: Outlaw Posse
Storyline: In 1908, an outlaw returns from years of hiding in Mexico to claim stolen gold hidden in the hills of Montana.

Title: Over the Red River
Storyline: Follows a tenacious young widow who braves the perilous desert to free her kidnapped sister and wreak vengeance on the outlaws who murdered her husband, while also crossing paths with an ex-member of the same gang that ruined her life.

Title: Pale Moon
Storyline: Reagen Moon is a young woman who is the daughter of the Sheriff. She feels like she has something to prove, and she tries her hand at being a bounty hunter with the help of the mysterious drifted named Bear.

Title: Paradise
Storyline: When corrupt officials cover up the murder of Ella's father, she cuts a swath through the anachronistic underbelly of her small island town.

Title: Pedro Páramo
Storyline: Follows a dusty road to a town of death. Time shifts from one consciousness to another in a hypnotic flow of dreams, desires and memories, a world of ghosts dominated by the figure of Pedro Páramo, lover, overlord, murderer.

Title: Rust
Storyline: An orphaned boy of 13 left to fend for himself and his younger brother in 1880s Wyoming is sentenced to hang for the accidental killing of a local rancher. His estranged grandfather breaks him out of jail and they go on the run to Mexico.

Title: Same Old West
Storyline: In the backlands of Goiás, two brutal men, after being abandoned by the same woman, turn violently against each other.

Title: Searching for the Elephant
Storyline: Recovering addict Jason, on parole, reunites with estranged veteran grandfather Griff at a ranch. Amidst their strained relationship, they face threats from adversaries demanding debt repayment.

Title: Seven Cemeteries
Storyline: A recent parolee (Danny Trejo) gets a Mexican witch to resurrect his old posse so that they can help him save a woman's ranch from a ruthless drug lord.

Title: Sinners in the Hands of an Angry God
Storyline: A ranger exacts bloody vengeance against the gang that killed their partner.

Title: Six Guns for Hire
Storyline: A vicious group of strangers gather to divvy up the spoils of a train robbery, while an ace detective pursues hot on their trail. As the bandits realize they may not be strangers after all, the detective unearths a deadly conspiracy at the heart of their crime.

Title: TV Heroes of the Wild West
Storyline: Follow fearless cowboys and lawmen as they take on outlaws and defend the frontier.

Title: Taken from Rio Bravo
Storyline: In 1874 Texas, two friends and an Indian scout rescue kidnapped women from sadistic traffickers near the Mexican border.

Title: The Ballad of Winchester Pete
Storyline: N/A

Title: The Dakota War: Attack on Fort Ridgely
Storyline: Starving on a federal reservation, Dakota Indians attack settlers and soldiers in 1862 in Minnesota.

Title: The Dakota War: Revenge
Storyline: In the aftermath of "Uprising" and "The Assault on Fort Ridgely", Colonel H. H. Sibley establishes a military tribunal to place the captured Dakota on trial for their actions. Lead by Lieutenant Olin and appointed commissioners, the US Army seeks revenge, but at what cost?

Title: The Ecstasy of Gold: The Treasure of Jesse James
Storyline: Colt Turner returns home eager to embrace his beloved partner Annie. His homecoming is met with a tense atmosphere, as Colt holds valuable information about the location of a legendary load of gold: the treasure of the famous Jesse James.

Title: The Film Café
Storyline: Two screenwriters struggle to come up with an idea to pitch to their boss at a film studio, and they have less than an hour until their appointment with.....the boss.

Title: The Golden Ghosts
Storyline: In 1852, a lone Black woman trudges along a riverbed watched by two Black men in the trees. They assume she is looking for gold, as they are, but conclude that the important thing is what she and they are fleeing. Slavery.

Title: The Goods, Bads and Uglys
Storyline: N/A

Title: The Guardsmen
Storyline: Oklahoma's famed Guardsmen are tasked with ridding the territory of Outlaws that threaten the American way of life.

Title: The Guardsmen: Part 2
Storyline: The story of Oklahoma's famed three Guardsmen as they continue to track down and rid the territory of infamous Outlaws in the Wild West.

Title: The Guardsmen: Part 3
Storyline: The conclusion of the Oklahoma Guardsmen saga as they battle Bill Doolin and the infamous Wild Bunch.

Title: The Letter
Storyline: LOGLINE: In the winter of 1912, a retired Army Chaplain and a Texas lawman brave the New Mexico mountains to deliver a deceased soldier's letter to his father.

Title: The Night They Came Home
Storyline: A frontier lawman partners with an Indian detective to hunt down a ruthless band of teenage criminals known as the Rufus Buck Gang.

Title: The Partners
Storyline: John, a dying from cancer cowboy tries to get medicine to expand his lifetime, by teaming up with his ex - partner, Bill.

Title: The Rattlesnake Twins
Storyline: In a wasteland marked by twins, one single pair brings back together Collector Enoch Moss and his sworn enemy, the Outlaw Paris Cassidy. As Cassidy ventures into The Lawless Lands, little does he know he's being tracked.

Title: The Stand at Alder Creek
Storyline: In 1862, in the Washington Territory, two prospectors journey to search for gold. Emotions rise and conflict follows when one of them hides their gold from the other.

Title: The Thicket
Storyline: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as The Thicket.

Title: The Unholy Trinity
Storyline: Buried secrets of an 1870s Montana town spark violence when a young man returns to reclaim his legacy and is caught between a sheriff determined to maintain order and a mysterious stranger hell-bent on destroying it.

Title: The Wicked: Reborn
Storyline: With his freedom and family on the line, former gunslinger Wesley Alan is sent on the hunt after a mysterious Samurai terrorizing the county. A past he hoped stay buried resurfaces as Wesley comes face to face with his greatest adversary yet.

Title: The forgotten Winchester
Storyline: N/A

Title: They Call Her Death
Storyline: Molly Pray is on a bloody crusade against the criminal forces who have wronged her. Her mission strikes at the myth of manifest destiny, but for Molly, with the embodied specter of Death on her side, this isn't political. This is personal.

Title: Travesty
Storyline: A big city detective Davaa is summoned to the Mongolian hinterlands because of a most unusual hostage situation. When Davaa arrives he finds himself surrounded by local police and officials who mock the situation and seem bizarrely frivolous in their duty to the hostages being ransomed for 1 billion Mongolian tugrik a person. This Ransom is an oddly precise sum related to a travesty of justice that tragically unfolds.

Title: Unnatural
Storyline: A gunslinger on a mission from God must track down supernatural creatures as penance for his past sins.

Title: Vadogga
Storyline: VADOGGA - the movie Sci-Fi Western Tragedy Comedy Experience the adventures of Vadogga and his dog Rakka. With the suicides of his customers, the two are the helping hand until the end. But then...

Title: Was Once a Hero
Storyline: Ginny and Little Bit, after their father's murder, flee outlaws across desert. They ally with ex-lawman Malcolm Hunter, hoping to reach Black Ridge for safety amidst peril and Malcolm's fading memory.

Title: Wynonna Earp: Vengeance
Storyline: Wynonna Earp is coming home to battle her greatest foe yet: a psychotic seductress hellbent on revenge against her...and everyone she loves.

Title: Zoloto Umalty
Storyline: Robbers in shamanic masks attack the convoy and steal 40 pounds of gold. The St. Petersburg gold miner accuses the nomadic Tungus tribe, recruits a detachment of thugs to return the stolen goods and take revenge, but not only he has prospects for gold.
